description:
Two billionaires, one plot of land. Aubrey Rose is on top of the world with her hotel empire, but that success is threatened when her business rival turns out to be her ex-flame Liam Harding-and along with the land, he might just steal her heart too.

Standalone in the Billionaire Games Series

***

When self-made billionaire Aubrey Rose arrives in the small town of Hunter Bay, it's the first step to steering her hotel business in a new direction. It's perfect, except for one teensy problem: the handsome, charismatic, billionaire heir Liam Harding, who also happens to be her ex-turned-competitor for the land.

Aubrey's used to working hard to get things done, but this competition will prove to be the most challenging part of her career yet. She faces an uphill battle not only against a town but also control of her emotions over Liam and their past. She wants to hate, she does hate him...and yet...
